langsim.datatypes.word_dict module¶

class WordDictionary(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: pimlico.datatypes.base.PimlicoDatatype

Dictionary for words (like the standard vocabulary/dictionary data structure) built from a corpus that has is encoded by character, maintaining the original character ID representation for each word.
